Give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge,<s%> that I may go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> that is so <S%H1419>great?<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from his journey to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> which he <S%H5117>placed<s%> in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
